role.argrole: thing applying to all or most members of a category or group

example.parse: (S (VP (PSEUDO_VERB ان) (NP-SBJ-3 (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الحديث)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC مع) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الوزير) (NOUN_PROP حمود)))) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS كان) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-3)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_ACC عاما)) (NP-TMP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC اثر) (NP (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG عودت) (NP (POSS_PRON_1S ي))) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NOUN_PROP واشنطن)))))))))
